name: Enies Lobby Underground Passage
nameJapanese: エニエス・ロビー地下通路
description: A flooded underground tunnel beneath Enies Lobby where the Straw Hat crew nearly drowns before being rescued by Kokoro in her mermaid form.

keyEvents.eventDescription: Kokoro reveals her mermaid form and rescues the drowning Straw Hats through the flooded passage
keyEvents.significance: Site of Kokoro's mermaid reveal and heroic rescue of the crew

name: Bridge of Hesitation
description: The bridge connecting the Tower of Justice to the Gates of Justice at Enies Lobby. Site of crucial confrontations and emotional moments during the Enies Lobby arc.

keyEvents.eventDescription: Franky rejects Spandam's bribe and punches him in the face
keyEvents.significance: Location of Franky's defiance and Robin's emotional breakthrough

keyEvents.eventDescription: Robin overcomes her trauma from Ohara and realizes she is no longer alone
keyEvents.significance: Site of one of the most pivotal character moments in Robin's arc

keyEvents.eventDescription: Robin and Franky hijack Spandam's escape ship
keyEvents.significance: Beginning of the Straw Hats' escape from Enies Lobby

name: Spandam's Escape Ship
description: A World Government escape vessel belonging to Spandam, which Robin and Franky hijack. Kokoro later brings the rescued Straw Hats onto this ship.

keyEvents.eventDescription: Robin and Franky take control of the ship, and Kokoro arrives with the unconscious crew
keyEvents.significance: Provides the means for the Straw Hats' escape from the Buster Call

name: Tower of Justice
description: The main judicial tower at Enies Lobby where CP9 operates. Site of numerous battles during the Enies Lobby arc.

keyEvents.eventDescription: Luffy fights Lucci in his weakened chibi state after Gear Third
keyEvents.significance: Continuing location of the climactic Luffy vs. Lucci battle

name: Enies Lobby
description: The Judicial Island and one of the three major World Government strongholds. Under constant bombardment from the Buster Call during this episode.

keyEvents.eventDescription: Oimo and Kashii break out with the Franky Family and Galley-La Company
keyEvents.significance: Mass escape attempt by the allied forces

keyEvents.eventDescription: The Buster Call continues to devastate the island
keyEvents.significance: Ongoing destruction creates urgency for all escape attempts

name: Enies Lobby Waterfront
nameJapanese: エニエス・ロビー海岸
description: The coastal area of Enies Lobby where escaping forces confront Marine warships.

keyEvents.eventDescription: Three Marine warships confront Oimo, Kashii, and the allied escape forces
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the next major obstacle in the escape from Enies Lobby
